TopicTitle: Issue with Contract Configurator 'Exception occurred while loading contract Exception occurred while loading contract' (Entire Message Below)

Articles.Content:
Exception occured while loading contract 'ExplorationPlus.ExplorationPlus-FlyBy':
System.ArgumentException: 'KopernicusWatchdog' is not a valid CelestialBody.
  at ContractConfigurator.ConfigNodeUtil.ParseCelestialBodyValue (System.String celestialName) [0x00046] in <ef0243a06f2841fe9bf57034a334902e>:0 
  at ContractConfigurator.ConfigNodeUtil.ParseSingleValue[T] (System.String key, System.String stringValue, System.Boolean allowExpression) [0x00179] in <ef0243a06f2841fe9bf57034a334902e>:0 
  at ContractConfigurator.ConfigNodeUtil.ParseValue[T] (ConfigNode configNode, System.String key, System.Boolean allowExpression) [0x002bc] in <ef0243a06f2841fe9bf57034a334902e>:0 
  at ContractConfigurator.ConfigNodeUtil.ParseValue[T] (ConfigNode configNode, System.String key, T defaultValue) [0x00012] in <ef0243a06f2841fe9bf57034a334902e>:0 
  at ContractConfigurator.ConfiguredContract.OnLoad (ConfigNode node) [0x00121] in <ef0243a06f2841fe9bf57034a334902e>:0 


I don't know what 'KopernicusWatchdog' is nor do I know how to fix this. Anything will help. I'm also using the JNSQ system replacer mod and Strategia 
-I have the Contract Pack: Bases and Stations Reborn

-Contract Pack: Clever Sats

-Contract Pack: Exploration Plus

-Contract Pack: Field Research

-Contract Pack: Tourism Plus

This belongs in some other thread, not as a topic in the add-on releases forum.
From what I'm seeing in your post, it should probably go in the Contract Configurator thread, and if you go there you might find that Kopernicus is a known incompatibility (not saying it is, just that they might already know about your bug, which means they might either have a fix for it on the way or a work-around or at least some knowledge that those two mods just don't play nice).
EDIT:
Also, if I had to hazard a guess, "KopernicusWatchdog" might be a phantom celestial body added in by Kopernicus to keep track of something about the solar system. Kopernicus is the "mostly code only" mod that lets JNSQ change the solar system, JNSQ on its own is "mostly just game assets like models and textures and not much code" since it's a planet pack, and as I'm sure you're aware JNSQ won't work without Kopernicus.
END EDIT

I understand that you're new on the forums, and it can sometimes be hard to figure out where to put something to get it noticed, but here it's not getting noticed in the right way. Instead of getting solutions for your problems, you're going to get people telling you where to put your post.

Also, there's this whole thing, which you should probably follow when you find the right place to put your bug report.

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/163863-how-to-get-support/

Edited June 4, 2022 by SciMan
Should just need to update kopernicus

The issue is he's using either an outdated ContactConfigurator (if he's using my fork) or more likely, just an outdated Kopernicus yes.  We releases a lot of builds rapidly over the past 2 days or so.

The latest Kopernicus builds do not have this awkward compatability issue.  grab here:

https://github.com/Kopernicus/Kopernicus/releases
